name: SoundCloud
description: Audio hosting with an embeddable player. Up to 3 hours of content is free.

name: Mixcloud
description: Audio hosting with unlimited uploads and an embeddable player.

name: Spotify
description: You can embed any song, album, or playlist with a Spotify Play Button.

name: Google Books
description: Allows you to display the books in your Google Books Library.

name: Goodreads API and widgets
description: Allows you to access any of the Goodreads data. Widgets are found on the widgets tab on your settings page.

name: Google Calendar
description: Embeddable calendar that you can collaborate with other people.

name: Booking.js
description: Beautiful embeddable booking widget.

name: zenplanner
description: Paid - Online scheduling for fitness.

name: Flickr
description: Online photo hosting by Yahoo.

name: Google Maps
description: Google maps are easily embeddable.

name: Mapbox
description: Really nice looking embeddable maps.

name: Prezi
description: Online presentations with really transitions that can zoom and rotate.

name: Reveal.js
description: HTML presentation framework.

name: Slides.com
description: A place for creating, presenting and sharing slide decks.

name: SpeakerDeck
description: Upload your slides as a PDF, and get an online, shareable presentation.

name: YouTube
description: Embeddable videos with unlimited uploads.

name: Vimeo
description: Paid - Embeddable videos with no ads.

name: Vevo
description: Embeddable music videos.

name: Vine
description: Embeddable vine videos.

name: Wistia
description: Free plan has a limit of 25 videos.

name: Codepen
description: A playground of embeddable front-end code examples.

name: JS Bin
description: Embeddable front-end code examples.

name: JSFiddle
description: Embeddable front-end code examples.

name: highlight.js
description: Syntax highlighting for the web.

name: 1Backend
description: Deploy your backend in seconds. Free tier included. Open source.

name: AWS Lambda
description: AWS Lambda lets you run code without provisioning or managing servers. You pay only for the compute time you consume

name: Google Cloud Functions
description: Create single-purpose, stand-alone functions that respond to Cloud events without the need to manage a server or runtime environment

name: Webtask by Auth0
description: Call code on the server with simple HTTP, easier to set up by far than Lambda or Google's

name: Azure Functions
description: by Microsoft - same premise as Lambda on the Azure cloud

name: IronWorkers
description: by Iron.io - Run code in a multilanguage containerized environment with unlimited scale and simple pricing

name: IronFunctions
description: by Iron.io - IronFunctions is an open source serverless computing platform for any cloud - private, public, or hybrid.

name: OpenWhisk by IBM
description: part of their BlueMix hosting platform, and open source, ties into their Watson AI ecosystem nicely

name: Staticman
description: Staticman is a Node.js application that receives user-generated content and uploads it as data files to a GitHub repository. In practice, this allows you to have dynamic content (e.g. blog post comments) as part of a fully static website, as long as your site automatically deploys on every push to GitHub, as seen on GitHub Pages, Netlify and others.

name: Disqus
description: Easily embeddable comments with nested replies, multiple login methods, and email notifications.

name: Facebook Comments
description: Embeddable comments for your site by Facebook.

name: IntenseDebate Comments
description: Embeddable comments with nested replies, multiple login methods, and email notifications.

name: LiveFyre
description: Real-time comments, SEO-optimized, stocked with social features, and beautiful on both desktop and mobile.

name: Redditjs Embed Widget
description: Embed Reddit comments on your site. If it hasn't been posted, it will show a link to encourage the user to submit.

name: Muut.com
description: Embeddable comments, forum and private messaging. A lot of functionality, but really low footprint left on your website.

name: Formspree
description: Receive emails from a form on your static website.

name: elFormo
description: Simple form processing and response retrieval via email.

name: Flipmail
description: Simple form processing and response retrieval via email.

name: MailThis
description: Simple form submissions via email with optional attachments.

name: Simple Form
description: Simple forms with optional file attachments, email notifications, and online submission viewing.

name: Brisk Forms
description: Free form submission service emails you responses while keeping your email address private and is open source.

name: 99 Inbound
description: Form endpoint service with email/Slack notifications and third party app integrations (e.g. MailChimp)

name: Google Forms
description: Saves results into Google Sheets and can email you when there is a submission.

name: FormKeep
description: Paid - View form submissions in a beautiful web interface. It has spam filtering and it integrates with webhooks such as Gmail, Trello, and Basecamp.

name: 123 Contact Form
description: Connects to other online services such at MailChimp, Salesforce, and Google Drive. It also integreates with payment Processers and includes security and analytics.

name: FormSite
description: Form buider, with payments, and form management.

name: FormStack
description: Forms with A/B testing, partial submission, analytics, and integrations.

name: Sheetsu
description: POST and GET your data to Google Spreadsheet.

name: Typeform
description: Awesome forms that can be embedded.

name: Wufoo
description: Free or Paid - Forms that you can build with a form designer, with notifications, reports, and payments.

name: Zoho
description: Forms with file upload and captcha.

name: GitHub Issues
description: This is an interesting way for developers to get comments/questions. See github.com/sindresorhus/ama for an example.

name: Utterences
description: A lightweight comments widget built on GitHub issues.

name: FormBackend
description: Create form-backends and submit your HTML forms to our backend. View the entries online and connect to other services. Receive an email every time a new entry is submitted.

name: Pageclip
description: A flexible server / backend for HTML forms. View your data in the realtime web interface, or use the API to get CSV and JSON output.

name: Formester
description: Forms and email marketing (lead collection, email campaigns, and newsletters) with integrations.

name: Netlify
description: Netlify comes with built-in form handling.

name: jivochat
description: JivoSite is a professional live chat for websites that was specifically designed to increase your online sales.

name: LiveChat
description: Live chat on your website.

name: Olark
description: Live chat on your website. You can also see who's on your website and what they're doing.

name: SnapEngage
description: Live chat with integrations and custom styles.

name: tawk.co
description: Lets you monitor and chat with visitors on your website.

name: WebsiteAlive
description: Live chat for your website & social networks.

name: Zopim
description: Live chat with free trial.

name: MailChimp
description: Free email marketing. You can pay to add more features.

name: Constant Contact
description: Email marketing with campaigns, autoresponders, and analytics.

name: AWeber
description: Email marketing with campaigns, autoresponders, and analytics.

name: Campaign Monitor
description: Email marketing with campaigns, autoresponders, and analytics.

name: MailerLite
description: Free email marketing. You can pay for more subscribers.

name: Google+
description: Google+ embedded post.

name: Pinterest
description: Pin It Button.

name: Twitter
description: Embedded tweets.

name: Facebook
description: Facebook embedded plugins.

name: ShareThis
description: Sharing buttons for multiple social networks.

name: Kontaktify

name: Google Forms
description: You can use Google forms for surveys or for forms on your site.

name: SurveyMonkey
description: Easy to use and free surveys.

name: Typeform
description: Really beautiful forms.

name: Qualaroo

name: Ecwid

name: SnipCart

name: Gumroad
